title: Blended Learning Design Workshop for High School and Vocational School Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Experience with Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Blended learning design competency development for pre-service teachers and educational practitioners applicable to high school/vocational school math education settings

learning_goals: Explain a 3+ step blended instruction design process utilizing the Tri Kaya Parisudha concept and Superitem structure
Design two or more interactive activities in an LMS environment similar to the Kelase platform
Propose improvement strategies to achieve 85%+ learning effectiveness using formative assessment tools (questionnaires/observation checklists)

resources: Tri Kaya Parisudha Educational Philosophy Guidelines

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
